summary:
Engineer by brain. Relationship builder at heart. Optimist at soul. 

üéôÔ∏è "Making sure your customers today, stay and become bigger, happier customers tomorrow" 
This is me explaining my day-to-day in Customer Success. 

Global sales & customer success professional with a technical background and proven track record driving top & bottom line business results across Asia and Europe in high pace, high tech & highly international environments. 

Currently consult with and advise customer success & community leaders looking to increase support, engagement, advocacy, and effectively gather product feedback. Helping global B2B SaaS brands 
üí∞ Retain and grow revenue by customer retention and expansion
üíª Capitalize on technology to accelerate growth & deliver impact

üëãüèº Want to chat? Feel free to contact me here! I‚Äôd be happy to chat or connect you to the right person.
